name: Brocat: the B Game
description: Experimental side-scroller with nostalgic memes. Dynamic strong B game, with Brocat as the main character and bugs that were carefully preserved by Developer.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX9.0c compatible sound card and drivers
